name: Tales of Iminensa: My Virtual Universe [Dual Screen]
name_original: Tales of Iminensa: My Virtual Universe [Dual Screen]
description:
Not fully compatible with smartphones!

Tales of Iminensa: My Virtual Universe is a Virtual Pet Game where you must take care of a Universe helping it to find out the meaning of everything.

Controls: Mouse

Created by Thiago Yasue.

Murasoft, 2021.

This game is part of the game series: "Sejsa fi Iminensa" (Tales of Iminensa).
